entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -32.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
